content.rendered: Yes, that’s right – we’re talking Oven Roasted BBQ Sausages! This recipe is to show you that our premium pork sausages are not only the best choice for grilling but also for roasting! You don’t need to wait for the summer to come and can easily prepare this dinner at home! The sausages go perfect with colorful peppers, onions, and potato wedges. With this recipe, no one will have room for a dessert.
